channel.title: [SRL]Falador Chicken Killer By TOB
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]Falador Chicken Killer By TOB[/size]
Well, this is my first *real* RS script and I'm looking for advice on improvement.
The script is located at http://sofakingpro.com/SCAR/Falador_Chicken_Killer_By_TOB.scar You will need to replace SRL\SRL\core\Login.scar with http://sofakingpro.com/SCAR/Login.scar. Its my version of Login.scar using my [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,45919.msg563565.html#new]AllPlayersInactive[/url] procedure.
When SRL gets updated to CurrentSkillXp(or until someone makes a temp one that works completely) I'll add a Progress report based on skill experience gained/time ran. [/center]

item.title: [SRL]Falador Chicken Killer By TOB
item.dc:creator: @N4TH4N N4TH4N
item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

I’m not going to continue to work on this script Hero but yes I added in something to pick up feathers.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL]Falador Chicken Killer By TOB

item.description:
@N4TH4N wrote:

[center][size=20pt]Falador Chicken Killer By TOB[/size]

Well, this is my first real RS script and I’m looking for advice on improvement.

The script is located at http://sofakingpro.com/SCAR/Falador_Chicken_Killer_By_TOB.scar
You will need to replace SRL\SRL\core\Login.scar with http://sofakingpro.com/SCAR/Login.scar.
Its my version of Login.scar using my AllPlayersInactive procedure.

When SRL gets updated to CurrentSkillXp(or until someone makes a temp one that works completely) I’ll add a Progress report based on skill experience gained/time ran.
